languages.text: "До тех пор, пока я нужна вам, о шерин, я буду разящим мечом в ваших руках, карающей плетью, свистящей над головами врагов, или верным помощником".
"As long as you need me, shereen, I will be a smiting sword in your hand, a punishing scourge whistling over the heads of your enemies, or a loyal helping hand."
languages.original_text: "До тех пор, пока я нужна вам, о шерин, я буду разящим мечом в ваших руках, карающей плетью, свистящей над головами врагов, или верным помощником".

traits.locale_text: "As long as you need me, shereen, I will be a smiting sword in your hand, a punishing scourge whistling over the heads of your enemies, or a loyal helping hand."
"As long as you need me, shereen, I will be a smiting sword in your hand, a punishing scourge whistling over the heads of your enemies, or a loyal helping hand."
"As long as you need me, shereen, I will be a smiting sword in your hand, a punishing scourge whistling over the heads of your enemies, or a loyal helping hand."
"As long as you need me, shereen, I will be a smiting sword in your hand, a punishing scourge whistling over the heads of your enemies, or a loyal helping hand."

languages.text: 「アンタがアタシを必要とするかぎり、アタシは剣となり、敵を罰するスカージとなり、忠実な助けの手となり続けるさ」
languages.original_text: "As long as you need me, shereen, I will be a smiting sword in your hand, a punishing scourge whistling over the heads of your enemies, or a loyal helping hand."

traits.locale_text: 「アンタがアタシを必要とするかぎり、アタシは剣となり、敵を罰するスカージとなり、忠実な助けの手となり続けるさ」

languages.text: “亲爱的，只要你一声呼唤，我就会成为你手中的利剑，为你的敌人带来灭顶之灾，或者成为你永远忠诚的帮手。”
languages.original_text: "As long as you need me, shereen, I will be a smiting sword in your hand, a punishing scourge whistling over the heads of your enemies, or a loyal helping hand."

traits.locale_text: “亲爱的，只要你一声呼唤，我就会成为你手中的利剑，为你的敌人带来灭顶之灾，或者成为你永远忠诚的帮手。”

languages.text: "So lange Ihr mich benötigt, Shereen, werde ich stets ein richtendes Schwert in Eurer Hand sein, eine strafende Peitsche, die über die Köpfe Eurer Feinde hinwegfliegt, oder eine treue helfende Hand."
languages.original_text: "As long as you need me, shereen, I will be a smiting sword in your hand, a punishing scourge whistling over the heads of your enemies, or a loyal helping hand."

traits.locale_text: "So lange Ihr mich benötigt, Shereen, werde ich stets ein richtendes Schwert in Eurer Hand sein, eine strafende Peitsche, die über die Köpfe Eurer Feinde hinwegfliegt, oder eine treue helfende Hand."

languages.text: «Mientras me necesite, shereen, seré la espada en su mano, el látigo que sirve de azote a sus enemigos y una fiel mano amiga con la que contar».
languages.original_text: "As long as you need me, shereen, I will be a smiting sword in your hand, a punishing scourge whistling over the heads of your enemies, or a loyal helping hand."

traits.locale_text: «Mientras me necesite, shereen, seré la espada en su mano, el látigo que sirve de azote a sus enemigos y una fiel mano amiga con la que contar».

languages.text: « Tant que vous aurez besoin de moi, shereen, je serai votre épée vengeresse, pareille à un fléau impitoyable sifflant au-dessus des têtes de vos ennemis, ou votre alliée loyale. »
languages.original_text: "As long as you need me, shereen, I will be a smiting sword in your hand, a punishing scourge whistling over the heads of your enemies, or a loyal helping hand."

traits.locale_text: « Tant que vous aurez besoin de moi, shereen, je serai votre épée vengeresse, pareille à un fléau impitoyable sifflant au-dessus des têtes de vos ennemis, ou votre alliée loyale. »

languages.text: "Şirinim, bana ihtiyacın olduğu sürece elindeki kılıcın darbesi olacağım, düşmanlarının kellesinin üzerinde uğuldayarak uçan gazap olacağım, senin sadık yardımcın olacağım."
languages.original_text: "As long as you need me, shereen, I will be a smiting sword in your hand, a punishing scourge whistling over the heads of your enemies, or a loyal helping hand."
